name: Alone (itch) (DevBoiAgru)
description:
Your spaceship has crashed on an unknown planet! Find some parts and fly home!

Controls: WASD - Movement

Left shift - Sprint

Spacebar - Jump

P/Escape - Pause

Instructions: Download the .rar file and extract the folder inside. Just open the .exe file in the folder and enjoy!

MADE FOR BYOG 2021
